zig_zag.info: Cold-calling: You respond to someone contacting you out of the blue to move their pension

splitter.info: Offered withdrawal: Transfer your pension to a scheme because they offer you early access to your pension

accelerator.info: ‘Free’ financial advice: You engaged with a company because they offered you free financial advice
accelerator.icon: pound signs with a cross through it

black_out.info: Black out: You engaged with a company because they offered a unique or limited investment opportunity

speedy.info: Time pressure: You agree to something because you are told the offer has a time limit on it

diagonal.info: Fake Scam Vigilante: Fake scammer vigilantes working on people’s fear of scams to get them to move their pension

normal_scam.info: Normal Scam: High returns with low risk

refuse.info: Refuse: Check FCA registered - get FCA number

pension_wise.info: Pension Wise: Check FCA registered - get FCA number

thinking_about.info: Thining About: Ask to sleep on your decision/ think about it

invisiblity_boon.info: FCA: Check FCA registered - get FCA number

dont_transfer.info: Don't transfer: Check with current provider before transferring
